name: @baron-zemo/backend-api2
description: Beneath black waves, Captain Vane heard bells tolling. His crew vanished in the fog, leaving lanterns afloat. The sound grew nearer, until cold hands dragged him toward the deepâ€™s silent kingdom.

scripts.build: npm run build:sdk && npm run compile && npm run format
scripts.build:hard: npm run build:hard:sdk && npm run compile && npm run format
scripts.build:sdk: rimraf ../../nestia-api/functional && cd ../.. && npx nestia sdk && cd sdk-package/api
scripts.build:hard:sdk: rimraf ../../nestia-api/functional && find ../../nestia-api/structures -name '*.ts' ! -name 'NestListener.ts' ! -name 'NextListener.ts' ! -name 'NextListenerHeader.ts' -delete && cd ../.. && npx nestia sdk && cd sdk-package/api
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run format && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.deploy:major: npm run build && npm run format && npm version major && npm publish

author: Fuck you daddy
